author: pete
msg: when reading the timestamp from a jar file we do not need to read to open the url connection's input stream so it will not hurt to call URLConnection#setDoInput(false). Eventually this could prevent the leakage of open file descriptors.

msg: Redesign of connection management classes based on new pooling components from HttpCore
